section.title: VirtuosoInfoMessageEventArgs Class
section.para: Provides data for the InfoMessage event. This class cannot be inherited.

section.title: Thread Safety
section.para: Any public static (Shared in Visual Basic) members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

section.title: Remarks
section.para: The InfoMessage event contains a VirtuosoErrorCollection collection with warnings sent from the Virtuoso srver.

section.title: Errors Property
section.para: Gets the collection of warnings sent from the Virtuoso server.

section.title: Property Value
section.para: The collection of warnings sent from the server.
